Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Northbound Reroute near Orleans/Wacker
ShortDescription: NB 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Franklin, Wacker, LaSalle, Hubbard, and Orleans, due to, street blockage near Orleans/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Franklin, Wacker, LaSalle, Hubbard, and Orleans, due to, street blockage near Orleans/Wacker.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Trains bypassing Halsted Station
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Halsted due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Halsted due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
